thread.title: BRIEF-Hillenbrand Posts Q1 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.28

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hillenbrand Posts Q1 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.28
text:
Jan 31 (Reuters) - Hillenbrand Inc:
* Q1 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.28 * Q1 REVENUE ROSE 12 PERCENT TO $397 MILLION * IS UPDATING ITS 2018 EPS GUIDANCE BASED ON TAX REFORM * FISCAL 2018 GAAP EPS OUTLOOK REVISED TO $1.98 - $2.10 * FISCAL 2018 ADJUSTED EPS OUTLOOK RAISED TO $2.28 - $2.40 * QUARTER-END ORDER BACKLOG GREW 37% OVER PRIOR YEAR TO $711 MILLION
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.25, REVENUE VIEW $1.64 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* QTRLY ADJUSTED DILUTED EPS $0.54 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.49, REVENUE VIEW $384.3 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text: [ bit.ly/2Fxjcyg ] Further company coverage:
